title: Light Switch
author: Charlie Puth
lyrics:
[00:10.98] Yeah
[00:12.61] Why you callin' at 11:30
[00:15.37] When you only wanna do me dirty?
[00:19.11] But I hit right back 'cause you got that, that, yeah
[00:23.05] Why you always wanna act like lovers
[00:25.74] But you never wanna be each other's?
[00:29.65] I say, "Don't look back" but I go right back and
[00:32.77] All of a sudden, I'm hypnotized
[00:35.17] You're the one that I can't deny
[00:37.84] Every time that I say I'm gonna walk away
[00:42.77] You turn me on like a light switch
[00:45.37] When you're movin' your body around and around
[00:48.48] Now, I don't wanna fight this (no)
[00:50.73] You know how to just make me want
[00:53.13] You turn me on like a light switch
[00:55.68] When you're movin' your body around and around
[00:58.56] You got me in a tight grip (yeah)
[01:00.82] You know how to just make me want you, baby
[01:05.37] Do you love it when you keep me guessin'? (Me guessin')
[01:08.32] When you leave, and then you leave me stressin' (me stressin')
[01:12.06] But I can't stay mad when you walk like that, no (uh)
[01:15.70] Why you always wanna act like lovers
[01:18.47] But you never wanna be each other's?
[01:22.23] I say don't look back, but I go right back and
[01:25.36] All of a sudden, I'm hypnotized (hypnotized)
[01:28.16] You're the one that I can't deny (can't deny)
[01:30.71] Every time that I say I'm gonna walk away (yeah)
[01:35.59] You turn me on like a light switch
[01:37.83] When you're movin' your body around and around
[01:40.92] Now, I don't wanna fight this (no)
[01:43.17] You know how to just make me want
[01:45.72] You turn me on like a light switch (switch)
[01:48.33] When you're movin' your body around and around
[01:51.34] You got me in a tight grip (grip)
[01:53.73] You know how to just make me want you, baby
[01:57.99] C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon
[02:00.09] C'mon and show me how you do (do)
[02:03.49] You want, you want, you want, you want
[02:05.76] You wanna keep me wantin' you (me wantin' you, girl)
[02:08.86] C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon
[02:10.73] C'mon and show me how you do (you do)
[02:13.95] You want, you want, you want, you want
[02:16.24] You wanna keep me wantin' you
[02:18.13] You turn me on like a light switch
[02:19.88] When you're movin' your body around and around
[02:22.98] Now, I don't wanna fight this
[02:25.11] You know how to just make me want you
[02:30.64] You turn me on like a light switch
[02:33.20] When you're movin' your body around and around
[02:36.37] You got me in a tight grip
[02:38.56] You know how to just make me want you, baby
[02:42.77] C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon
[02:45.17] C'mon and show me how you do (how you do)
[02:48.33] You want, you want, you want, you want
[02:50.60] You wanna keep me wantin' you (baby)
[02:53.63] C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon
[02:55.60] C'mon and show me how you do (how you do)
[02:58.52] You want, you want, you want, you want
[03:01.03] You wanna keep me wantin' you
[03:01.86]
